metadata.name: Custom Kind Soul Token #1/10
metadata.description:
This custom Kind Soul token allows it's holder to design their own still or animated kind soul with Shabas, the founder and artist. 

To redeem, collect this NFT, join the KSC discord, verifying assets, and fill out the request ticket in #design-your-ks.

Shabas will then reach out, draw your Kind Soul, mint it to the Kind Soul Commune Collection, airdrop it to you, and change the metadata of this NFT to reflect that it has been used.


**Kind Soul Commune has the right to refuse any request that does not align with our brand or vision. This includes any request that does not align with our pillars of kindness, love, and individuality. Absolutely no violent, sexual, hateful, provocative and/or discriminatory content.**
